opponent.label: Meia Gisborn
opponent.artist: spnanon, Hologic, Vortex00, Halo, thelonelyphonebox, Onboro, Lokkit
opponent.description: The young, cool, and collected Chief Pilot of the Dread fighters that defend the starship Nirvana, crewed by pirates from the all-female colony of Mejare. Beneath her stoic exterior lies a burning desire to prove herself---and to understand men.

epilogue.description: WARNING: This epilogue is legacy content featuring older art. A new, expanded version is in the works!
WARNING: This epilogue is legacy content featuring older art. A new, expanded version is in the works!
